thread.title: Law Society ‘should release’ Michelle Thomson property files
thread.title_full: Law Society ‘should release’ Michelle Thomson property files - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Law Society ‘should release’ Michelle Thomson property files
text:
29
Have your say Nicola Sturgeon has indicated that the Law Society of Scotland should publish all documents it has on its investigation into property deals linked to Michelle Thomson MP.
At First Minister’s Questions, Ms Sturgeon once more faced questions about the property transactions that have led to Mrs Thomson being suspended from the SNP.
The Scottish Labour leader leader pressed the First Minister on the role of the Law Society in the case.
